title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aapko apni kala yatra ke baare mein batana chahti hoon.
Anushka: Bachpan mein, rang aur kagaz hi mere sabse acche dost the.
Anushka: Parivar chahta tha, doctor ya engineer banoo. Kala, unke liye, hobby thi, career nahi.
Anushka: Lekin, dil toh rangon mein hi atka raha.
Anushka: Ek din, maine apne banaye kuch paintings ek exhibition mein bheje.
Anushka: Aur... ek painting bik gayi! Pehli baar, mujhe laga, shayad main sahi raaste par hoon.
Anushka: Phir maine kala ko apna career banaya. Mushkil toh aati hain, par rangon se jo khushi milti hai, woh kahin aur nahi.
Anushka: Ab, main exhibitions karti hoon, workshops leti hoon, aur logon ko kala se judne mein madad karti hoon.
Anushka: Meri kala yatra abhi jaari hai. Aur main har rang, har brushstroke se, kuch naya seekh rahi hoon.
Anushka: Apne sapnon ko kabhi mat chhodo. Kyunki, kya pata, aapki kala hi aapki pehchaan ban jaye! Dhanyavaad.
